title: The Molly Q
description: SPY VS SPYGeorgia Bains's world had just turned topsy-turvy! She'd only been trying to deliver a package, a nice, normal thing to do. Instead, she'd somehow stumbled upon The Molly Q, a top-secret computer project. Then gorgeous, marvelous Luke Montana stumbled across Georgia, and he decided she was a computer spy!Georgia wanted to hate Luke, especially once he kidnapped her, but he was so handsome, so commanding, that his explanations made perfect sense. She told him she was innocent, but he wouldn't believe her. . . even as he made wonderful love to her! Could Georgia get Luke to realize the truth? More important, could they ever get out of this mess?
author: Lass Small
